name: 全球運籌管理
description: This course teaches students the related issues associated with the strategies and planning of global logistics and operations. Students will be able to describe and explain fundamentals of global operation and logistics strategies, global operations and logistics planning, and effective management of global operations and logistics.
syllabus:
**【授課方式：16+2週】**

1.  Introduction (1 week)
2.  Supply Chain Strategies (1 week)
3.  Logistics Service Providers (1 week)
4.  Procurement and Outsourcing (1 week)
5.  Inventory Management (2 weeks)
6.  Warehousing and Materials Management (1 week)
7.  Transport in Supply Chains (1 week)
8.  Information Flows and Technology (1 week)
9.  Measuring and Managing Logistics Performance (1 week)
10.  Sustainable Logistics and Supply Chain Systems (1 week)
11.  Supplier Network Development (1week)
12.  Article presentation (3 weeks)
13.  Term project presentation (1 week)
